nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource

Class TestResource<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.resource.TestResource<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeadersTestResource, JsonTestResource, PlainTextTestResource, XmlTestResource

    public abstract class TestResource<T>
extends Object
    Used for retrieving resources necessary for testing and carrying out validation of responses against the expected value
    Author:
    David MacDonald
